about_the_game:
A narrative-driven puzzle game that combines "optical illusions" with "single-stroke puzzle" as its theme. Players rotate their perspective in a 3D space, using optical illusions to connect vertexes and segments, completing the patterns in each level with a single stroke.

Chaos begins to emerge. The vertexes scattered randomly; The segments curled silently. Until the weaver - your appearance. Perspective is your weapon; Weaving is your mission. Connect those stars together. Fill in those blanks. Don't be afraid of misalignment, don't stick to appearances.

Find truth in countless failures

Using one stroke, weave a new universe

Gameplay description:

In three-dimensional space, the graphics in the level are drawn in single stroke by connecting vertexes and segments.

  • Connection rule: All segments must be connected and cannot be repeatedly connected.

  • Perspective interaction: Level design is based on 3D space, and adjusting the perspective will change the structure and connectivity of the graphics.

  • Special mechanism:

    • Directional segment: When connecting, the direction of the arrow must be followed.

    • Dynamic elements: Some vertexes may flicker, move over time, or appear or disappear due to different perspectives.

      ......

  • Multi solution: Most levels have multiple solutions, allowing players to try different strategies and find a more efficient path to pass.
